root.description: You come across a wooden bridge passing over a dark, shallow stream.

exit.description: The black, thorn-ridden [woods] lie on one side of the bridge.
exit.onCheck: The [woods] are dark, and a chill breeze blows from them.

exit.description: A [clearning] can be seen on the other side.
exit.onCheck: Star speckle the sky above the [clearning].

prop.description: A thin [book] rests in the middle of the bridge.
prop.onCheck: The cover has a hand-written title: Joss's Survival Guide. Most of its pages have been torn out. One of the remaining pages reads: "To see what items you are carrying with you, type "inventory" and hit ENTER."
